001package org.consensusj.jsonrpc;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JavaType;
005import org.slf4j.Logger;
006import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
007
008import javax.net.ssl.SSLContext;
009import java.net.URI;
010import java.net.http.HttpClient;
011import java.net.http.HttpRequest;
012import java.net.http.HttpResponse;
013import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
014import java.time.Duration;
015import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
016import java.util.concurrent.CompletionException;
017import java.util.function.Function;
018
019/**
020 * Incubating JSON-RPC client using {@link java.net.http.HttpClient}
021 */
022public class JsonRpcClientJavaNet extends AbstractRpcClient {
023    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(JsonRpcClientJavaNet.class);
024    private final URI serverURI;
025    private final String username;
026    private final String password;
027    private final HttpClient client;
028    private static final String UTF8 = StandardCharsets.UTF_8.name();
029
030
031    public JsonRpcClientJavaNet(JsonRpcMessage.Version jsonRpcVersion, URI server, final String rpcUser, final String rpcPassword) {
032        this(getDefaultSSLContext(), jsonRpcVersion, server, rpcUser, rpcPassword);
033    }
034
035    public JsonRpcClientJavaNet(SSLContext sslContext, JsonRpcMessage.Version jsonRpcVersion, URI server, final String rpcUser, final String rpcPassword) {
036        super(jsonRpcVersion);
037        log.debug("Constructing JSON-RPC client for: {}", server);
038        this.serverURI = server;
039        this.username = rpcUser;
040        this.password = rpcPassword;
041        this.client = HttpClient.newBuilder()
042                .connectTimeout(Duration.ofMinutes(2))
043                .sslContext(sslContext)
044                .build();
045    }
046
047    public JsonRpcClientJavaNet(URI server, final String rpcUser, final String rpcPassword) {
048        this(JsonRpcMessage.Version.V2, server, rpcUser, rpcPassword);
049    }
050
051    /**
052     * {@inheritDoc}
053     */
054    @Override
055    public <R> CompletableFuture<JsonRpcResponse<R>> sendRequestForResponseAsync(JsonRpcRequest request, JavaType responseType) {
056        return sendCommon(request)
057                .thenApply(mappingFunc(responseType));
058    }
059
060    // For testing only
061    CompletableFuture<String> sendRequestForResponseString(JsonRpcRequest request) {
062        return sendCommon(request);
063    }
064
065    /**
066     * {@inheritDoc}
067     */
068    @Override
069    public URI getServerURI() {
070        return serverURI;
071    }
072
073    private String encodeJsonRpcRequest(JsonRpcRequest request) throws JsonProcessingException {
074        return mapper.writeValueAsString(request);
075    }
076
077    /**
078     * @param request A JSON-RPC request
079     * @return A future for a JSON-RPC response in String format
080     */
081    private CompletableFuture<String> sendCommon(JsonRpcRequest request) {
082        log.debug("Send: {}", request);
083        try {
084            HttpRequest httpRequest = buildJsonRpcPostRequest(request);
085            return client.sendAsync(httpRequest, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString())
086                    .whenComplete(this::log)
087                    .thenComposeAsync(this::handleStatusError)
088                    .thenApply(HttpResponse::body)
089                    .whenComplete(this::log);
090        } catch (JsonProcessingException e) {
091            return CompletableFuture.failedFuture(e);
092        }
093    }
094
095    private CompletableFuture<HttpResponse<String>> handleStatusError(HttpResponse<String> response) {
096        if (response.statusCode() != 200) {
097            String errorResponse = response.body();
098            log.error("Bad status code: {}: {}", response.statusCode(), errorResponse);
099            return CompletableFuture.failedFuture(new JsonRpcStatusException(errorResponse, response.statusCode(), errorResponse, -1, errorResponse, null));
100
101        } else {
102            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(response);
103        }
104    }
105
106    private HttpRequest buildJsonRpcPostRequest(JsonRpcRequest request) throws JsonProcessingException {
107        String requestString = encodeJsonRpcRequest(request);
108        return buildJsonRpcPostRequest(requestString);
109    }
110
111    private HttpRequest buildJsonRpcPostRequest(String requestString) {
112        log.info("request is: {}", requestString);
113
114        String auth = username + ":" + password;
115        String basicAuth = "Basic " + base64Encode(auth);
116
117        return HttpRequest
118                .newBuilder(serverURI)
119                .header("Content-Type", "application/json;charset=" +  UTF8)
120                .header("Accept-Charset", UTF8)
121                .header("Accept", "application/json")
122                .header("Authorization", basicAuth)
123                .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.ofString(requestString))
124                .build();
125    }
126
127    private <R> MappingFunction<R> mappingFunc(JavaType responseType) {
128        return s -> mapper.readValue(s, responseType);
129    }
130
131    /**
132     * Map a response string to a Java object. Wraps checked {@link JsonProcessingException}
133     * in unchecked {@link CompletionException}.
134     * @param <R> result type
135     */
136    @FunctionalInterface
137    protected interface MappingFunction<R> extends Function<String, R> {
138
139        /**
140         * Gets a result. Wraps checked {@link JsonProcessingException} in {@link CompletionException}
141         * @param s input
142         * @return a result
143         */
144        @Override
145        default R apply(String s) {
146            try {
147                return applyThrows(s);
148            } catch (JsonProcessingException e) {
149                throw new CompletionException(e);
150            }
151        }
152
153        /**
154         * Gets a result and may throw a checked exception.
155         *
156         * @param s input
157         * @return a result
158         * @throws JsonProcessingException Checked Exception
159         */
160        R applyThrows(String s) throws JsonProcessingException;
161    }
162    
163    private void log(HttpResponse<String> httpResponse, Throwable t) {
164        if ((httpResponse != null)) {
165            log.info("log data string: {}", httpResponse);
166        } else {
167            log.error("exception: ", t);
168        }
169    }
170
171    private void log(String s, Throwable t) {
172        if ((s != null)) {
173            log.info("log data string: {}", s.substring(0 ,Math.min(100, s.length())));
174        } else {
175            log.error("exception: ", t);
176        }
177    }
178}
